lead_paragraph: Serena Williams set up a quarterfinal match against Maria Sharapova in the Family Circle Cup in Charleston, S.C., overcoming a sprained ankle and a sluggish performance to beat Katarina Srebotnik, 4-6, 6-4, 6-3. The second-seeded Sharapova beat Taiana Perebiynis, 7-5, 6-2. Jelena Jankovic, the top seed, defeated unseeded Anastasia Rodionova, 6-0, 6-2. Jankovic will face ninth-seeded Vera Zvonareva.
